item.title: Deanna McLeod Pt. 4: AGILE Regulations - Circumventing Regulatory Barriers that Protect Canadians from Harm for Profit [Open Mike with Michael Thiessen]
item.description:
OPEN MIKE w/Michael Thiessen ~ May 11, 2023

On this week's episode of OPEN MIKE, Mike is joined by Canadian Covid Care Alliance (CCCA) clinical researcher Deanna McLeod, founder of Kaleidoscope Strategic and Covid Sense, this time to talk about how our government has partnered with industry to help them circumvent the safety barriers put in place to protect Canadians from harm.

Episode Resource: Canadian COVID Care Alliance: https://www.canadiancovidcarealliance.org/; 

SUPPORT FOR HAROLD JONKER'S DEFENCE FUND: https://givesendgo.com/TruckersLegalSupport?utm_source=sharelink&utm_medium=copy_link&utm_campaign=TruckersLegalSupport;
